commandDescriptions.channel_scan: Get information about users sent to this or defined channel.
commandDescriptions.lang: Change language of bot for server or user.
commandDescriptions.link: Enable copying of messages in this channel to another.
commandDescriptions.link_list: Get channel links for this server.
commandDescriptions.music_play:
Play a video.
If no URL or query is specified, unpauses playback.
Queries are searched on YouTube, but URL can be from any source.
Quotes are not required for one-word queries.
commandDescriptions.permission:
Manage permissions of specific item.
Requires item to be manageable by caller.

errors.already_linked_destination: Cannot link to a linked channel.
errors.arguments_less_than_expected: Provided arguments less than expected (need at least $1).
errors.arguments_more_than_expected: Provided arguments more than expected (need at most $1).
errors.cannot_manage_emojis: Cannot manage emojis on this server.
errors.cannot_manage_language: You cannot manage a language of this server.
errors.cannot_read_channel: Channel is not a text channel or permissions are missing.
errors.command_management_not_allowed: You don't have permission to manage this command.
errors.emoji_already_exists: Emoji with this name already exists.
errors.linking_outside_guild: Cannot link to/from channels outside of an guild.
errors.no_videos_added: At least one video should be added to queue.
errors.not_in_server: This command is only available in servers.
errors.not_in_voice: Join any voice channel and try again.
errors.target_management_not_allowed: You don't have permission to manage this type of target.

link_list.no_channels_linked: No channels are linked with this channel.

help.title: Help
help.select_command: Select a command to view information about it.
help.select_command_in_category: Select a command in this category to view information about it.
